name: Be a Pirate
description:
Be a Pirate - a game about a small but brave pirate, whose goal is to collect all the coins and escape faster.

At first glance, the goal is quite simple: to run from door to door, but not everything is so easy. On the way, you need to collect all the coins, sometimes they are hidden and you need to find them, solving riddles and completing tasks, while your time is limited, and at every step enemies are waiting for you - other ruthless pirates, guns, whales eating bombs, live cucumbers. Also, you can perform additional tasks, finishing off all the enemies on the map with your bombs to earn more stars per level.
A platformer type game made in pixel art with a side view.

What awaits you in this game:

< 25 different levels

< 6 unique enemies
< atmosphere of heavy pirate everyday life
< interesting logic tasks and riddles
< good background music
